articles.title: US to award TSMC $6.6B in grants, $5B in loans to step up chip manufacturing in Arizona - TechCrunch
articles.description: TSMC is getting the grant under the CHIPS Act, in the latest step by the U.S. to reshore domestic chip manufacturing.
